EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-06-13-Policy-Driven-Automation-Demo.ES-2018-06-13_June_Webinar_Email2_0
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance to Register | Trustworthy Resizing Automation with Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-policy-driven-automation/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Workload automation in your hybrid cloud, on-premises, or even just in the public cloud, should be as easy as a few clicks. Join Technology Evangelist Eric Wright as he demonstrates trustworthy workload automation with Turbonomic on June 13th at 11am ET.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-policy-driven-automation/]]>
In this 30 minute session you will learn how to quickly set up workload automation in Turbonomic for scaling resources anywhere in your environment with easy-to-use policies.
See you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-policy-driven-automation/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterwards.
